Articles.Content:
See, I read MOOSE, didn't see that it was a link and had an image of Jeb riding a flying moose into space.

I think I need to sleep...
i had a similar idea expect there was rainbows coming from the moose.
New Image: "Rollout"

i had a similar idea expect there was rainbows coming from the moose.

A moose doing a Sonic Rainboom! In SPAAAAAAACE!!!!!!

Oh good, Chobit posted the new pic. Now I can sleep...
oooooh wait why does it say enclave?

A moose doing a Sonic Rainboom! In SPAAAAAAACE!!!!!!

Oh good, Chobit posted the new pic. Now I can sleep...

I support this idea. To the FULLEST aspect. And with the most AWESOME of jubilation!

oooooh wait why does it say enclave?

Valhalla Enclave
Wow, I like the new pic Chobit!
Nicely done. Reminds me of the scene where Hachi first sees the tandem mirror engine in Planetes.

I'm very much resisting the urge to invite chobit to the KSP Roleplay a second time, but she probably is too busy with art/real life. Still, I like the new image, and the idea of the Valhalla Enclave is very interesting.
If that were to happen I'd be too busy trying to defend my island and it's huge cache of natural resources

If that were to happen I'd be too busy trying to defend my island and it's huge cache of natural resources

I would join the IRC channel JUST to watch that evolve, Chobit. Just saying.

Seconding this.
Thirding that.
Chobit, are you gonna make a PFL flag for our games?

Wouldn't you rather have your own flag?

I'm working with the guy who made the ribbon signature generator to make a flag/mission patch generator

Edited May 23, 2013 by chobit-389

Wouldn't you rather have your own flag?

They wouldn't come near to a PfL flag by you.

Here ya go

And don't forget
wooooooooh i love that shading
Now how do you add that into the flags ingame? I really want to have that as the first flag on the mun. Also, lovely music. Germany has such a rich culture and history.
Put it in: KSP_win\GameData\Squad\Flags

Put it in: KSP_win\GameData\Squad\Flags

This is actually not a good idea. The contents of GameData\Squad should be left alone.

Better to make your own subfolder in Gamedata, and then make a Flags folder inside that to hold your flags.

That way you can easily copy your flags and any custom parts you made from version to version.

My own is in Gamedata/Seraphim/Flags.

I like the clean look that has though, very crisp model.
Hey everyone! I finally made it back to Laythe and planted some flags! And some buildings...... just a few
hey chobit shouldnt you remove rollout from the WIP section...

Hey everyone! I finally made it back to Laythe and planted some flags! And some buildings...... just a few

....................You just want Odin here don't you.

So you've built a city on Lathye then? How do you cope with the radiation

hey chobit shouldnt you remove rollout from the WIP section...

I should, but I won't, maybe later when I think of a way to reorganize the images and still have it look nice

....................You just want Odin here don't you.

So you've built a city on Lathye then? How do you cope with the radiation

I've technically broken zero rules, I see no use of NSDAP imagery here, only German. The Reichsadler and Iron Cross were around LONG before WWII... or guns

As for rads, we solve that with a hearty diet of sauerkraut, sausage und beer severed by beautiful busty Bavarian barmaids!
